data: [[1222680,[["Achievement_GOSCC_33",{"strName":"哈克尼的梦想","strDescription":"配备可提供最大越野赛道牵引力的操控零件赢得一场比赛","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1222680/b9f89b98918f6a69e91253b977a8e07395474f28.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":9.600000381469727}],["Achievement_GOSCC_34",{"strName":"组成零件","strDescription":"配备可提供最大公路赛道牵引力的操控零件赢得一场比赛","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1222680/ae776f422df8dafef4ee99b6822983bc18011a69.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":36.400001525878906}],["Achievement_GOSCC_35",{"strName":"全速行驶","strDescription":"配备可提供最佳比赛性能的操控零件赢得一场比赛","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1222680/b9f89b98918f6a69e91253b977a8e07395474f28.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":27.600000381469727}],["Achievement_GOSCC_36",{"strName":"新的开始","strDescription":"声望达到2级","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1222680/b9f89b98918f6a69e91253b977a8e07395474f28.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":68.5}],["Achievement_GOSCC_37",{"strName":"恶名昭著","strDescription":"声望达到50级","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1222680/b9f89b98918f6a69e91253b977a8e07395474f28.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":17.299999237060547}],["Achievement_GOSCC_38",{"strName":"收获颇丰","strDescription":"一晚获得1000000点声望","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1222680/b9f89b98918f6a69e91253b977a8e07395474f28.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":11.199999809265137}],["Achievement_GOSCC_39",{"strName":"危险区域","strDescription":"完成所有速度快照","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1222680/b9f89b98918f6a69e91253b977a8e07395474f28.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":2}],["Achievement_GOSCC_40",{"strName":"切换","strDescription":"驾驶一辆置换了发动机的车赢得一场比赛","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1222680/b9f89b98918f6a69e91253b977a8e07395474f28.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":30.299999237060547}],["Achievement_GOSCC_41",{"strName":"环游世界","strDescription":"赢得“发现”赛事","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1222680/b9f89b98918f6a69e91253b977a8e07395474f28.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":6.300000190734863}],["Achievement_GOSCC_42",{"strName":"吼声震天","strDescription":"驾驶一辆排气声已经过调校的车赢得一场比赛","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1222680/ae776f422df8dafef4ee99b6822983bc18011a69.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":26.600000381469727}],["Achievement_GOSCC_2",{"strName":"瞩目","strDescription":"完成第1章","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1222680/82a511a3c0a39043f63cf328ee69e43c28c52b77.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":45.099998474121094,"bHidden":true}],["Achievement_GOSCC_3",{"strName":"世界碰撞","strDescription":"完成第2章","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1222680/82a511a3c0a39043f63cf328ee69e43c28c52b77.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":28.899999618530273,"bHidden":true}],["Achievement_GOSCC_4",{"strName":"宾至如归","strDescription":"完成第3章","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1222680/82a511a3c0a39043f63cf328ee69e43c28c52b77.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":21.5,"bHidden":true}],["Achievement_GOSCC_5",{"strName":"铁血无情","strDescription":"完成第4章","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1222680/82a511a3c0a39043f63cf328ee69e43c28c52b77.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":18.5,"bHidden":true}],["Achievement_GOSCC_6",{"strName":"还差4分钟","strDescription":"撞毁100辆警察车辆","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1222680/b9f89b98918f6a69e91253b977a8e07395474f28.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":7.099999904632568}],["Achievement_GOSCC_7",{"strName":"神速","strDescription":"使用任何车辆达到每小时386.24公里（240英里）的速度","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1222680/82a511a3c0a39043f63cf328ee69e43c28c52b77.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":7.099999904632568,"bHidden":true}],["Achievement_GOSCC_8",{"strName":"夜空中最亮的星","strDescription":"在游戏的所有活动中获得3星评分。","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1222680/b9f89b98918f6a69e91253b977a8e07395474f28.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":1.600000023841858}],["Achievement_GOSCC_9",{"strName":"改名","strDescription":"更改车牌上的文字","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1222680/b9f89b98918f6a69e91253b977a8e07395474f28.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":25.5}],["Achievement_GOSCC_10",{"strName":"一场赛事，两名车手","strDescription":"在车队计时赛中赢得首次胜利","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1222680/b9f89b98918f6a69e91253b977a8e07395474f28.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":28.899999618530273}],["Achievement_GOSCC_11",{"strName":"小小乐土","strDescription":"撞破了所有广告牌","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1222680/b9f89b98918f6a69e91253b977a8e07395474f28.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":2.4000000953674316}],["Achievement_GOSCC_12",{"strName":"我说马上！","strDescription":"驾驶一辆性能评分为399的车赢得一场比赛","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1222680/b9f89b98918f6a69e91253b977a8e07395474f28.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":13.899999618530273}],["Achievement_GOSCC_13",{"strName":"夺魁","strDescription":"收集所有的收藏品并在所有活动中获得3星","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1222680/b9f89b98918f6a69e91253b977a8e07395474f28.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":1.5}],["Achievement_GOSCC_14",{"strName":"翻盘小子","strDescription":"在一场比赛的最后一圈从最后一名跃至第一名并获胜","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1222680/b9f89b98918f6a69e91253b977a8e07395474f28.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":9.800000190734863}],["Achievement_GOSCC_15",{"strName":"巧妙过弯","strDescription":"完成驾驶故事“漂移”","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1222680/82a511a3c0a39043f63cf328ee69e43c28c52b77.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":13.100000381469727,"bHidden":true}],["Achievement_GOSCC_16",{"strName":"潜踪隐迹","strDescription":"完成驾驶故事“越野”","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1222680/82a511a3c0a39043f63cf328ee69e43c28c52b77.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":9.100000381469727,"bHidden":true}],["Achievement_GOSCC_17",{"strName":"好友重聚","strDescription":"完成驾驶故事“竞速”","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1222680/82a511a3c0a39043f63cf328ee69e43c28c52b77.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":8.899999618530273,"bHidden":true}],["Achievement_GOSCC_18",{"strName":"把膜贴起来！","strDescription":"在车上贴上一张贴膜","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1222680/b9f89b98918f6a69e91253b977a8e07395474f28.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":38.79999923706055}],["Achievement_GOSCC_19",{"strName":"不要放弃你的日间任务","strDescription":"完成第一个每日挑战","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1222680/b9f89b98918f6a69e91253b977a8e07395474f28.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":62.70000076293945}],["Achievement_GOSCC_20",{"strName":"漂移，漂移，漂移","strDescription":"完成所有漂移区域","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1222680/b9f89b98918f6a69e91253b977a8e07395474f28.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":2}],["Achievement_GOSCC_21",{"strName":"技术发达","strDescription":"在辅助零件槽位均已使用的情况下赢得一场比赛","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1222680/b9f89b98918f6a69e91253b977a8e07395474f28.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":33.5}],["Achievement_GOSCC_22",{"strName":"指责徒劳","strDescription":"在车辆所有效果槽位均已使用的情况下赢得一场比赛","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1222680/b9f89b98918f6a69e91253b977a8e07395474f28.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":7.699999809265137}],["Achievement_GOSCC_23",{"strName":"崔维斯，是谁？","strDescription":"逃脱100次警察追捕","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1222680/b9f89b98918f6a69e91253b977a8e07395474f28.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":14.699999809265137}],["Achievement_GOSCC_24",{"strName":"收效显著","strDescription":"完成25场与其他玩家的在线比赛","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1222680/b9f89b98918f6a69e91253b977a8e07395474f28.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":8.800000190734863}],["Achievement_GOSCC_25",{"strName":"你有朋友吗？","strDescription":"完成5场与其他玩家的在线比赛","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1222680/b9f89b98918f6a69e91253b977a8e07395474f28.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":15.800000190734863}],["Achievement_GOSCC_26",{"strName":"捕烈能手","strDescription":"收集所有火烈鸟","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1222680/82a511a3c0a39043f63cf328ee69e43c28c52b77.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":2,"bHidden":true}],["Achievement_GOSCC_27",{"strName":"千钧一发","strDescription":"夜间在加油站修复致命伤害","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1222680/b9f89b98918f6a69e91253b977a8e07395474f28.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":42.20000076293945}],["Achievement_GOSCC_28",{"strName":"称霸艺方","strDescription":"收集所有街头艺术","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1222680/b9f89b98918f6a69e91253b977a8e07395474f28.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":2}],["Achievement_GOSCC_29",{"strName":"最高通缉","strDescription":"赢得一场热度为5的高热度比赛并安全返回车库","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1222680/b9f89b98918f6a69e91253b977a8e07395474f28.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":11.5}],["Achievement_GOSCC_30",{"strName":"全力以赴","strDescription":"完成所有长距离跳跃","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1222680/b9f89b98918f6a69e91253b977a8e07395474f28.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":1.7999999523162842}],["Achievement_GOSCC_31",{"strName":"万众一心","strDescription":"与你的车队一起达到车队等级上限","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1222680/b9f89b98918f6a69e91253b977a8e07395474f28.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":25.700000762939453}],["Achievement_GOSCC_32",{"strName":"甩尾风格","strDescription":"配备可实现最远距离漂移的操控零件赢得一场比赛","strImage":"https://cdn.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1222680/b9f89b98918f6a69e91253b977a8e07395474f28.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":13.800000190734863}]]]]
